alert.note: Alert for Edgecombe (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 20 at 8:55AM EST until December 23 at 1:32PM EST by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in North Carolina... Tar River At Tarboro affecting Edgecombe County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tar River at Tarboro. * WHEN...Until early Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 19.0 feet, Minor flooding begins. The Riverside Park and River Road at the US64 bridge flood. At 20.0 feet, Lowland flooding begins south of Daniel Street in east Tarboro. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 AM EST Wednesday the stage was 19.6 feet. - Bankfull stage is 19.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 20.2 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 19.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am EST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Sun Tar River Tarboro 19.0 19.6 Wed 8 am EST 20.1 19.9 18.0 13.0 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/rah/rivers. The next statement will be issued this evening at 900 PM EST.
